title: Water Plant Protect
purpose: Develop a Desktop Assessment Application for Windows & Mac to assist water plant employees with CISA CPG compliance at 3,800 Ohio Water Plants.
github: Repository is private due to agreement with sponsor.
responsibilities: Maintain correspondence with Ohio Cyber Reserve Standards Officer to provide project updates, organize user testing, and make critical development decisions.
Complete CISA Cross-Sector Cybersecurity Performance Goals (CPG) Compliance training and received certification.
Design a user-friendly, interactive CPG assessment of 38 questions that includes accessibility features, save options, on demand education guides, and report generation.
Developed a searchable knowledge base to host over 60 knowledge documents such as risk management plans, incident response plans, and more.
Maintain sprint boards and comprehensive project documentations for the product team, sponsor, and end users.
Complete missions with Ohio Cyber Reserve Members at participating water plants for user testing and application demos
technology: React | CSS | Electron.js | JSON | CISA CPG Certified | Project Documentation | Agile

title: Collapsing Drums
purpose: Develop an eCommerce site of the product team's choice with the goal of developing design skills with React/CSS and utilizing serverless backend architecture with AWS.
responsibilities: Utilize React, CSS, and graphic tools such as Canva to create a responsive, user-friendly interface that allows users to stream music, manage concert tickets, and purchase merchandise.
Adopt AWS RDS feature to manage database of inventory for the business and a 3rd party shipping service.
Deploy lambda functions to manage inventory between presentation tier and the database, ensuring real-time updates and synchronization.
Deploy lambda functions to process payment and shipping information retrieved via http POST request.
Utilize AWS RDS to maintain a robust and scalable database for storing inventory, shipping, and payment details appropiately.
technology: React | CSS | Node.js | Bootstrap | Amazaon Web Services (AWS) | MySQL
